fields.name: **Acid Rain** (Passive):
fields.value: At the end of each night, you automatically astrally attack every player who scored below you in the previous Evening. Players who survive this attack won't know they were attacked.

fields.name: **Thunder** (0x, Charge 90%):
fields.value: Target a player to permanently reduce their Defense Power by 0.35x. You cannot reduce their Defense Power below 0.25x.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: Live to see only yourself and up to two other players survive.
